director.name: 保罗·斯马契尼 Paul Smaczny

this_title: Claudio Abbado: The Silence That Follows the Music (1996)
introduction: A portrait of the internationally acclaimed conductor looking at his work with the Berlin Philharmonic Orchestra, and two ensembles he founded - the Chamber Orchestra Of Europe and the Gustav Mahler Youth Orchestra plus a look at the human being behind the roles he plays.
chinese_title: Claudio Abbado: The Silence That Follows the Music (1996)
